name: @TMX_PLUGIN_NAME@
description: Listens for Location messages and generates SRM messages

configuration.description: The length of milliseconds before location messages are considered stale and should not be used.
The length of milliseconds to sleep between checks to send SRM.
Vehicle role in the SRM, 12 = police, 13 = fire, 14 = ambulance
The number of milliseconds between sending SRMs.
